Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the music in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
Options:
A. a) Christophe Beck composed the theme music for Doctor Strange.
B. b) Doctor Strange was released in 2015.
C. c) The Ant-Man (2015) theme was used in Avengers: Endgame.
D. d) Christophe Beck is the composer for both Doctor Strange and Ant-Man.
Answer: a) Christophe Beck composed the theme music for Doctor Strange. c) The Ant-Man (2015) theme was used in Avengers: Endgame. d) Christophe Beck is the composer for both Doctor Strange and Ant-Man.

Question: Which composers are associated with the music for the Marvel movie Doctor Strange?
Options:
A. Michael Giacchino
B. Christophe Beck
C. Hans Zimmer
D. Alan Silvestri
